## Image\_2 class

Helper methods for specifying simple or tiled images.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare abstract class Image 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [simple(url)](./bge-core.image_2.simple.md) | <code>static</code> | Describes an image as a file, by URL. |
|  [tile(url, rows, cols, row, col)](./bge-core.image_2.tile.md) | <code>static</code> | Describes an image as a tile within a larger image atlas file. |
